Ivans_Cell.desc: The cell door to Ivans cell. Its torn off the wall.

Rotten_Banana.desc: A completely black banana. Almost certainly not safe to eat.

Empty_Handgun.desc: A guards handgun. There is no magazine.

Desk.desc: The guard desk in the center of the block.

Janitors_Key.desc: A key to many doors in the prison

North_Cell_Block.shortDesc: Ivans cell block. It appears to be nearly untouched.
North_Cell_Block.longDesc: An oddly tidy cell block. This is Ivans cell block, and if hes here it could mean trouble for you. The man is terrifying!

South_Hall.desc: The entrance to the south hall.

Bloody_Cell.desc: You can see that this cell is completely covered in blood. What happened here?

Jones_Cell.desc: This cell is completely sealed up from a roof collapse. It belongs to your old friend, Jones, a friendly backyard chemist.

Note_From_Warden.desc: A note from the warden to the guard stationed in the south block.

traits.Text: Remember to keep prisoner 203, Jones, away from the janitors closet!

Desk.desc: The guard desk in the center of the block.

South_Cell_Block.shortDesc: Jones cell block. Its completely torn apart.
South_Cell_Block.longDesc: The entire room is falling apart. Its almost like a wreaking ball was swung around in here. This is the cell block where your friend Jones used to be. Hes probably dead, or a zombie, but might as well check, right?

Waste_Dump.desc: The sewage is running this direction, its probably a way out!

Easter_Egg_Room.desc: The sewage is draining from this direction. Theres probably nothing of importance

Ground.desc: The sewage on the ground is absolutely disgusting.

Sewer.shortDesc: The sewer again... its not easier this time.
Sewer.longDesc: As you crawl on your belly into the vile sewer, you find yourself questioning if escape is even worth this horrible stench. It takes all of your might to keep going.

Rock.desc: A rock that has fallen from your cell wall.

Shiv.desc: A piece of scrap metal, filed into a knife.

Mattress.desc: You remember stuffing your mattress with contraband.

Start_Cell.longDesc: This is your cell, the miserable, disgusting hole youve spent your last few years.

Freedom.desc: The front gate, on the other side is freedom.

Ground.desc: The floor is extremely muddy here.

Front_Gate.longDesc: This is the same place where you remember being brought into this concrete nightmare all those years ago. Outsideof the main gate is freedom.

Cafeteria.desc: A swinging door leads to the cafeteria.

oven.desc: The oven is completely disabled, the gas is turned off. What is happening outside this prison?

Beans.desc: A can of baked beans. If only you could find a can opener...

pantry.desc: This cabinet used to be filled with food that would last days... it appears to have been emptied.

Apron.desc: Meant to keep food off clothes while cooking, but it seems to be covered in zombie goo now.

Zombie_Chef.desc: This zombie looks like Jim. He used to work in the kitchen, I think he was once a car thief.

Kitchen.shortDesc: This place should not be used to prepare food. Everything is disgusting.
Kitchen.longDesc: This room used to make food for the whole prison. Its tiny, very tiny, and extremely gross. You find yourself hoping that the mysterious liquids covering the walls only appeared after the apocalypse... but that seems like wishful thinking.

Kitchen.desc: Inside you see what looks like a kitchen, and is that food?

South_Hall.desc: Looks like a hallway but heading in the south direction

West_Hall.desc: Looks like a halway but heading in the weat direction

Courtyard.desc: looking through you see grass and a big fence

Garbage.desc: A hard solid mass of dried up Garvage, who knows what this used to be, its got some weight to it

Trash_Can.desc: a dirty old trash can with the smell of old garbage coming out of it.

Spoon.desc: A large Wooden Spoon about a foot and a half long, a little chipped at the ends

Food_Pile.desc: A smelly pile of waste that might possibly have been food lying on a table

Soda_can.desc: A can of Diet Spripesi Cola Up, its the quenchiest! looks edible

Vending_Machine.desc: A banged up old vending machine, looks like its still powered, with a few drinks left.

Jawless_Zombie.desc: A Zombie, missing a jaw looks around with only one eye that stares hungrily, but it probably cant do much

Cafeteria.shortDesc: The moldy and messy Cafeteria appears to be unchanged and still dirty.
Cafeteria.longDesc: You walk into a big open room with rectangular dinning tables strewn about. Old plates of food and broken chairs are thrown around, a smell of mold permeates the air, im glad im not hungry right now

Front_Gate.desc: Through the metal Iron bars, it looks like theres another gate across this control room that leads to the road, freedom.

Guard_Room.desc: there are some computer screens that are still lit and something that looks like a metal cylinder.

Cafeteria.desc: Looks like theres a mess of dinning tables and what looks like piles of waste all over.

South_Hall.desc: There is a long dim lit corridor that seems to lead on for a bit.

Basketball.desc: A roughed up faded orange basketball

Horde.desc: A Huge horde of almost 50 zombies wanders around aimlesly together as they look for any way to move around.

Courtyard.shortDesc: The dried grass sways in the wind and the concrete walls stand firm
Courtyard.longDesc: A cobblestone path leads out to the front gate. Dried grass makes up the field ahead as the concrete walls surrounding you a recovered by moss with barbed wire wrapped around the top, an orange sphere is visible in the field

West_Hall.desc: This leads to the West Hall

Pills.desc: You find some pills, they might be able to recover some health, or just get you really high.

Cabinet.desc: As you approach the cabinet, you can see some things inside that might be useful

Surgical_Knife.desc: You find a surgical knife with some blood still left on it. This place was never that clean anyway

Tray.desc: You see a surgical knife laid out on the tray

Nurse_Uniform.desc: A nurse uniform. A little torn, and bloody, and covered in many fluids. Still wearable

Nurse_Zombie.desc: A zombie wearing a nurse uniform

Hospital_Ward.longDesc: You open the door and see a bed and a tray in the middle of the room. You look to your right and see the medical cabinet in the corner. There must be something in here I can use you say to yourself. As you search the room you remember the time that Ivan almost beat you to death because you didnt give him your cookies. You spent a week in pain recovering in the Hopsital Ward, but it was nice not having to be in that cell for a little bit

North_Cell_Block.desc: Dirty floor and walls and what looks like 2 moving bodies

Guard_Room.desc: there are some computer screens that are still lit and something that looks like a metal cylinder.

Hospital.desc: A series of what looks like unmade beds with dirty white sheets

West_Hall.desc: A long dirty corridor, must be the West hallway it looks like it has some other doors

Toothbrush_Shank.desc: A small plastic toothbrush with a sharp filled end

North_Hall.shortDesc: the long ominous hallway with doors for the Hospital wing, West hallway and north cell block
North_Hall.longDesc: A long dusty hallway stretches ahead with another barred door at the other end, along with others leading to what seems like more cells.  One of these doors has a red cross on it. there are scattered belongings accross the floor

West_Hall.desc: This leads to the West Hall

Washroom.desc: You can hear water running as you continue walking. This must be the door to the washroom

South_Cell_Block.desc: You see blood stains on the ground infront of the door. This leads to the South Cell Block

Janitors_Closet.desc: This leads to the Janitors Closet. There might be something useful in there

South_Hall.longDesc: The South Hall looks completely abandoned just like West Hall did. You see several corpses with missing limbs and what looks like bites that have been taken out of them. As you take a closer look you see a corpse with its eyes wide open and quickly realize it was your good friend Jeff. You take a moment to close his eyes and pray that he is in a better place now. A tear runs down your face as you get up and continue to move on trying to escape this hellhole.

West_Cell_Block.desc: Dirty floor and walls , zombie free for now

Easter_Egg_Room.desc: there seems to be music playing and fuzz images in the back of the room, need to get closer

Hospital.desc: A series of what looks like unmade beds with dirty white sheets

North_Hall.desc: A long dirty corridor, must be the North hallway it looks like it has some other doors

South_Hall.desc: A long dirty corridor, must be the South hallway it looks like it has some other doors

Cafeteria.desc: The door to the cafeteria. Covered in grease, like always

Syringe.desc: A used syringe, can be used to poison

West_Hall.shortDesc: the long ominous hallway with doors for the Hospital wing, north and south hallway and West cell block
West_Hall.longDesc: the long ominous hallway with doors you hear the sounds the prison echoing through the doors, down the hall you can see the hospital wing, more hallways, north and south and halls leading,back the way you came.

South_Hall.desc: Looks like a hallway but heading in the south direction

Guard_Key.desc: The key to the guard room

Crack_Pipe.desc: Joe Dirts half used crack pipe, if i smoke it should help with my withdrawals

Bandaids.desc: Band-aids may come in handy if i run into zombies or worse

Shovel.desc: You pick up a shovel, You can use it to break through somewhere

Joes_Drawer.desc: Joe Dirts draw is left open, he must of left in a rush

Janitors_Closet.shortDesc: The Janitors Closet is a small room in the south hall.
Janitors_Closet.longDesc: The Janitors Closet is a small room in the south hall. Joe Dirts the prison Janitor, he doesnt carry a weapon but hes always high, his stash might be inside the closet. As you approach you dont hear any zombies inside

Waste_dump.desc: small metal bars attached to a hinge, the sewage tunnel you came through is beyond

Waste_Dump.shortDesc: opening up around you is the dump for all the sewage from the entire prison, gross
Waste_Dump.longDesc: As you travel down this tunnel of refuse you slide out into the open air and land into an even bigger pile of waste as you are dumped out of the prisons sewage, as you make your way to freedom.

South_Hall.desc: This leads to the South Hall

Sewer.desc: You see a crack in the floor that looks like it might lead somewhere. You need a something strong like a sledgehammer to break through.

Metal_Pipe.desc: This pipe must have fallen from the ceiling after the pipes burst

Washroom.longDesc: You can hear the slow fall of water dripping from the ceiling, you take a step forward and feel something wet at your feet. You look down to see you are standing in a pool of blood. The washroom has been the place of many unspeakable acts, but thankfully you have never dropped the soap and are safe from the traumatizing experience other inmates faced. As you examine the room you notice a giant crack in the floor and see a small pipe next to it.

South_Cell_Block.desc: what looks like the empty cell block, the window is smudged in blood

Hand.desc: a bloody hand attached to what remains of an arm

Bloody_Cell.shortDesc: a bloody mess on the floor from the previous inmates remains
Bloody_Cell.longDesc: A grotestesque scene of blood and gore, it looks as though the inmate who belonged in this cell is now the bloody puddle of red slop in the floor. the cell is turned upsidedown, there must have been a terrible struggle before he was pinned down on the floor and eaten alive. note to self, dont get cornered.

North_Cell_Block.desc: This leads to the North Cell Block

Sledgehammer.desc: A giant sledgehammer, good for smashing.

Ivan.desc: Ivan is a 7ft tall giant. No one in the prison messes with him because he will literally kill you. He can be a great ally, but an even worse enemy.

Ivans_Cell.longDesc: This cell belongs to Ivan. The beast of the prison. You heard stories about how he killed 10 men with only his fists. You do not want to run into this guy

Start_Cell.desc: its the door that leads to your cell, nothing new

West_Hall.desc: You see that there is a hallway beyond, this must be the door to the west hall

Hallway_Key.desc: A key card to the hallways

Corpse.desc: the mutilated corpse of one of the inmates, Pedro, face first in the ground, his back completly devoured.  his right arm is outstretched looks like he was holding something. Bugger always had sticky fingers

West_Cell_Block.shortDesc: the now completly destroyed cell block lacks any of its former security, or sanitation due to the blodd.  Poor Pedros burial will have to wait
West_Cell_Block.longDesc: The familiar cell block no longer looks the same.  the once clean interior is now spattered with blood, littered with broken furniture, busted cell doors and metal bars, near the exit door you see the body of an inmate, he looks like someone you know.

Courtyard.desc: You can see into the courtyard, from what you can tell this is how you entered the prison, but now theres a bunch of zomies roaming around

North_Hall.desc: A long dirty corridor, must be the North hallway it looks like it has some other doors

Bullet_Proof_Vest.desc: A old vest with stab marks, but its bullet proof

Empty_Gun.desc: The Gun has no ammo, this still might come in handy

Gun.desc: The Guards Gun still has ammo, this will come in handy real soon

Tactical_Vest.desc: A old vest with stab marks, but its bullet proof

Prison_Guard.desc: A Guard is hiding under his desk, hes been beaten and is scared

Guard_Room.shortDesc: The guards room is dimly lit, maybe everyone left but its worth checking out for weapons
Guard_Room.longDesc: Judging by the state of the prison you would expect this room to be empty, the lights are dim,the room is messy from people scavenging, they must be looking for weaopons, the guards areusually armed, its worth checking out

West_Hall.desc: You can see you to the west hall, no one in sight but cant be sure if thats a good thing

Empty Gun.desc: A corpse is clutching a gun with no bullets, he looks to have shot himself from the music

Corpse.desc: A corpse is lying face down holding a gun with no bullets while the song plays in the background.You cant tell at this point if he shot himself to get away from the zombies or the music

Easter_Egg_Room.shortDesc: This room is mysterious or a complete waste of time
Easter_Egg_Room.longDesc: This room was likely used for torture, this prison is rampant with experiments and unethical,guards, the longer you spend in this room the more likely you end up like the corpse on thefloor

South_Cell_Block.desc: what looks like the empty cell block, the window is smudged in blood

Bomb.desc: Rick Asthlys Never gonna give you up is playing on a screen

Bomb_Making_Equipment.desc: With Jones help this equipment can be used to make bombs

Mike_Jones.desc: A weak old man who landed in prison for crimes against humanity, his intelligence is all thats left

Jones_Cell.shortDesc: This cell contains the prisons most infamous felon, Mike Jones, anarchist
Jones_Cell.longDesc: This is the top security wing of the prison, the most dangerous criminals are locked away here.Mike Jones is an old man know and has no strength to fight zombie but his bomb making skils arelegendary, his skill will be useful
